Class Project

java.lang.Object
  com.luntsys.luntbuild.db.Project
All Implemented Interfaces:
VariableHolder, java.io.Serializable, org.acegisecurity.acl.basic.AclObjectIdentity
public class Project
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.acegisecurity.acl.basic.AclObjectIdentity, VariableHolder

The class represents a luntbuild project.

Author:
robin shine

getUserByVcsLogin

public User getUserByVcsLogin(java.lang.String login,
                              java.util.List users)
This function determines the luntbuild user by the vcs login string

Parameters:
login - version control system login name
users - luntbuild users list
Returns:
maybe null if no user found to match this vcs login

validate

public void validate()
Validate all properties of this project

validateAtBuildTime

public void validateAtBuildTime()
Validate all properties of this project at build time. It is different from validate() method in the way that it enforces vcsList and builderList not empty

validateBasic

public void validateBasic()
Validate project basic properties. Complicate properties such as getVcsList(), getBuilderList(), will not get validated

isVcsModifiedSince

public boolean isVcsModifiedSince(java.util.Date sinceDate)
Determines if vcs contents of this project has changed. This function will use value of the following thread local variables in OgnlHelper workingSchedule, this variable denotes the project which this method is initiated by antProject, this variable denotes the logging ant project this method should use revisions, this variable denotes the revisions for working schedule

Parameters:
sinceDate - date
Returns:
if vcs contents of this project has changed

isVcsModifiedSince

public boolean isVcsModifiedSince(java.lang.String sinceDate)
Returns true if VCS for this project has been modified since given date.

Parameters:
sinceDate -
Returns:
true if vcs modified

isVcsModified

public boolean isVcsModified(java.lang.String scheduleName)

Parameters:
scheduleName -
Returns:
true if vcs modified
